brand.name: FR Brand
brand.help: FR The brand is the product's manufacturer, whose name can usually be found on the front of the camera or lens.

model.name: FR Model
model.help: FR Camera bodies usually state their model on the front. For lenses you can enter all the text written around the front lens.
model.placeholder: FR D800, 5D Mark III, 50mm f1.4 AF, SB-900 flash, ...
